meanings.sent1: The group of friends decided to machinate a surprise party for Sarah.
meanings.sent2: The detective suspected the criminal was machinating a robbery.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous elves machinated a plan to prank the villagers.
meanings.sent4: The evil queen machinated her way to the throne by manipulating others.
meanings.sent5: The students machinated a clever strategy to ace their exams.

meanings.sent1: The spies machinated a plan to infiltrate the enemy base.
meanings.sent2: The rival companies were machinating a merger behind closed doors.
meanings.sent3: The siblings machinated a scheme to surprise their parents on their anniversary.
meanings.sent4: The rebels machinated a rebellion against the oppressive regime.
meanings.sent5: The witches machinated a potion to grant them eternal youth.
